title: A Guide For The Perplexed: Tech Gadgets For Holiday Gifts
teaser: Two product reviewers at the tech news site Re/code share their top picks for the baby boomers, teens and fitness freaks in your family.
contentencoded:
The tech news site Re/code has reviewed gadgets, both affordable and expensive, to help people searching for the perfect tech gift.

Recode’s team of four senior reviewers, Walt Mossberg, Katie Boehret, Bonnie Cha and Lauren Goode have each looked at a category of gadgets:

  • What to Buy a Boomer
  • Tech Relief for Parents of Young Children
  • Cool Tech for Teens and College Students
  • Gadgets for Fitness Freaks

Bonnie Cha and Lauren Goode discuss the top picks with Here & Now’s Peter O’Dowd.

Guests

  • Lauren Goode, senior reviewer for Re/code. She tweets @LaurenGoode.
  • Bonnie Cha, senior reviewer at Re/code. She tweets @BonnieSCha.
